description: Join a group of friends for a scenic 120-minute winter cycling tour through Münster’s historical streets and beautiful parks.

locationInfo.description: This 120-minute route takes you through Münster’s city center and along the picturesque Aasee, ideal for a peaceful winter cycling experience.
safetyTips: Dress warmly and wear gloves to avoid cold hands.
Check your bike before starting the ride.

activity: Visit to the LWL Museum of Natural History
description: Explore the LWL Museum of Natural History with your group for an enriching 130-minute experience discovering exhibits on nature, wildlife, and history.

locationInfo.description: This museum offers interactive exhibits, making it a perfect place for a cold day of learning and exploring nature and history.
safetyTips: Be mindful of the museum's opening hours.
Avoid loud conversations to maintain a respectful atmosphere.

description: Spend 150 minutes challenging yourselves with indoor rock climbing at Boulderwelt, a great activity to enjoy with friends on a cold day.

locationInfo.description: Boulderwelt is a top indoor rock climbing gym where you can push your physical limits in a safe, enjoyable environment.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable athletic clothing and climbing shoes.

description: Take a 120-minute walk through Münster Zoo with your group, observing animals in their natural habitat while learning about conservation.

locationInfo.lighting: Natural daylight and artificial lighting in exhibits
locationInfo.description: Münster Zoo is a large park that offers an array of animals, from elephants to birds of prey, making it an educational and enjoyable experience.
safetyTips: Keep a safe distance from the animals.
Respect the zoo's rules for a positive experience.

description: Work together as a team to solve puzzles and escape within 120 minutes at one of Münster’s thrilling escape rooms.

locationInfo.description: Escape Room Münster offers exciting and challenging escape room experiences perfect for a fun group activity to test your problem-solving skills.
safetyTips: Listen carefully to the rules and instructions before entering.
Stay calm and communicate clearly with your team.
